upgrade_active_reload.Name: Active Reload
upgrade_active_reload.Description: While reloading, pressing [Reload] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

Passive.Description: While reloading, pressing [Reload] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

upgrade_thermal_detonator.Name: Alchemical Fire
upgrade_thermal_detonator.Description:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

Deals 40% less DPS vs non-heroes.

Active.Description:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

Deals 40% less DPS vs non-heroes.

upgrade_ammo_scavenger.Name: Ammo Scavenger
upgrade_ammo_scavenger.Description: Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.

Passive.Description: Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.

upgrade_berserker.Name: Berserker
upgrade_berserker.Description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

Passive.Description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

upgrade_vampire.Name: Bullet Lifesteal
upgrade_vampire.Description: Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies. Half as effective vs Non-Heroes.

upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder.Name: Bullet Resist Shredder
upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder.Description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

Passive.Description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

upgrade_burst_fire.Name: Burst Fire
upgrade_burst_fire.Description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.

Passive.Description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.

upgrade_close_range.Name: Close Quarters
upgrade_close_range.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

Passive.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

upgrade_cold_front.Name: Cold Front
upgrade_cold_front.Description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

Active.Description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

upgrade_colossus.Name: Colossus
upgrade_colossus.Description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the movement and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

Active.Description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the movement and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield.Name: Combat Barrier
upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield.Description: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.

Passive.Description: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.
Headshots reduce target's Bullet and Spirit Resist.

upgrade_glitch.Name: Curse
upgrade_glitch.Description: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

Active.Description: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

upgrade_debuff_reducer.Name: Debuff Reducer
upgrade_debuff_reducer.Description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Passive.Description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration.Name: Debuff Remover
upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration.Description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Passive.Description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Active.Description:
Purge all negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, gain a movement speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

upgrade_rupture.Name: Decay
upgrade_rupture.Description:
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal.

Active.Description:
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal.

upgrade_savior.Name: Divine Barrier
upgrade_savior.Description: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Movement Speed. Can be self-cast.

Active.Description: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Movement Speed. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_diviners_kevlar.Name: Diviner's Kevlar
upgrade_diviners_kevlar.Description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.

Passive.Description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.

upgrade_arcane_extension.Name: Duration Extender
upgrade_arcane_extension.Description: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.

Innate.Description: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.

Active.Description: Reset the cooldown of your most recently used non-ultimate ability.

upgrade_magic_shield.Name: Enchanter's Barrier
upgrade_magic_shield.Description: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.

Passive.Description: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.

upgrade_cardio_calibrator.Name: Enduring Speed
upgrade_cardio_calibrator.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.

Passive.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.

upgrade_escalating_exposure.Name: Escalating Exposure
upgrade_escalating_exposure.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

Passive.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

upgrade_reinforcing_casings.Name: Escalating Resilience
upgrade_reinforcing_casings.Description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

Passive.Description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

upgrade_self_bubble.Name: Ethereal Shift
upgrade_self_bubble.Description:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you cannot move or perform any actions. Afterwards you instantly reload and gain bonus Spirit Power.
Can be cancelled early.

Active.Description:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you cannot move or perform any actions. Afterwards you instantly reload and gain bonus Spirit Power.
Can be cancelled early.

upgrade_extra_charge.Name: Extra Charge
upgrade_extra_charge.Description: Adds one to your ability max charges.

Innate.Description: Adds one to your ability max charges.

Passive.Description: Removes the Movement Speed penalty while shooting.

Active.Description: Gain bonus Movement Speed and Ammo.

upgrade_chonky.Name: Fortitude
upgrade_chonky.Description: After not taking damage for 11s, gain 4% Max Health Regen.

Passive.Description: After not taking damage for 11s, gain 4% Max Health Regen.
When you are above 75% health, you have bonus Weapon Damage and Movement Speed.
While you are below 40% health, you gain stat bonuses.

upgrade_glass_cannon.Name: Glass Cannon
upgrade_glass_cannon.Description: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of 7 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

Passive.Description: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of 7 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

upgrade_headhunter.Name: Headhunter
upgrade_headhunter.Description: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.

Passive.Description: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.

upgrade_headshot_booster.Name: Headshot Booster
upgrade_headshot_booster.Description: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.

Passive.Description: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.

upgrade_healbane.Name: Healbane
upgrade_healbane.Description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

Passive.Description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

upgrade_healing_booster.Name: Healing Booster
upgrade_healing_booster.Description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by 25% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by 15%.

Passive.Description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by 25% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by 15%.

upgrade_health_stimpak.Name: Healing Rite
upgrade_health_stimpak.Description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

Active.Description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_health_nova.Name: Health Nova
upgrade_health_nova.Description: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional 20% per ally.

Active.Description: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional 20% per ally.

upgrade_dps_aura.Name: Heroic Aura
upgrade_dps_aura.Description: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.

Passive.Description: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.

Active.Description: Provides bonus Movement Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies.

upgrade_hollow_point_rounds.Name: Hollow Point Ward
upgrade_hollow_point_rounds.Description: When you are above 60% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

Passive.Description: When you are above 60% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura.Name: Hunter's Aura
upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura.Description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

Passive.Description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

upgrade_magic_shock.Name: Improved Burst
upgrade_magic_shock.Description:
Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 125 damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for 5s after taking damage from it.

Passive.Description:
Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 125 damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for 5s after taking damage from it.

upgrade_magic_tempo.Name: Improved Cooldown
upgrade_magic_tempo.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

Innate.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

upgrade_tech_range.Name: Improved Reach
upgrade_tech_range.Description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

Innate.Description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

upgrade_infuser.Name: Infuser
upgrade_infuser.Description: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.

Active.Description: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.

upgrade_inhibitor.Name: Inhibitor
upgrade_inhibitor.Description: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.

Passive.Description: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.

upgrade_intensifying_clip.Name: Intensifying Magazine
upgrade_intensifying_clip.Description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

Passive.Description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

upgrade_kinetic_sash.Name: Kinetic Dash
upgrade_kinetic_sash.Description: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to s.

Passive.Description: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.

upgrade_target_stun.Name: Knockdown
upgrade_target_stun.Description: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a 2s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action.

Active.Description: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a 2s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action.

upgrade_damage_recycler.Name: Leech
upgrade_damage_recycler.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.

upgrade_boxing_glove.Name: Lifestrike
upgrade_boxing_glove.Description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 55% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 110. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

Passive.Description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 55% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 110. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

upgrade_long_range.Name: Long Range
upgrade_long_range.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

Passive.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

upgrade_critshot.Name: Lucky Shot
upgrade_critshot.Description: Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus damage and Slow on hit.

Passive.Description: Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus damage and Slow on hit.

upgrade_magic_carpet.Name: Magic Carpet
upgrade_magic_carpet.Description: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit shields.  Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.  While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.

Active.Description: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit shields.  Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.  While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.

upgrade_rocket_booster.Name: Majestic Leap
upgrade_rocket_booster.Description:
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.

Active.Description:
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.

upgrade_melee_charge.Name: Melee Charge
upgrade_melee_charge.Description:
Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage and either reload your weapon instantly or give you up to +100% bonus ammo.
Only activates when Bonus Ammo is not full.

Passive.Description:
Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage and either reload your weapon instantly or give you up to +100% bonus ammo.
Only activates when Bonus Ammo is not full.

upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets.Name: Melee Lifesteal
upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets.Description: Your Melee attacks heal you for 20% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 90. This heal is 30% effective vs non-heroes.

Passive.Description: Your Melee attacks heal you for 20% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 90. This heal is 30% effective vs non-heroes.

upgrade_metal_skin.Name: Metal Skin
upgrade_metal_skin.Description: Become immune to bullets and melee attacks.

Active.Description: Become immune to bullets and melee attacks.

upgrade_non_player_bonus.Name: Monster Rounds
upgrade_non_player_bonus.Description: Gain additional 35% Weapon Damage when attacking Troopers, Neutrals and Bosses.

upgrade_magic_burst.Name: Mystic Burst
upgrade_magic_burst.Description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 80 damage or more in a single hit.

Passive.Description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 80 damage or more in a single hit.

upgrade_magic_reach.Name: Mystic Reach
upgrade_magic_reach.Description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

Innate.Description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

upgrade_tech_bleed.Name: Mystic Reverb
upgrade_tech_bleed.Description: Imbue an ability to apply slow in a radius around the target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

Passive.Description: Imbue an ability to apply slow in a radius around the target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

upgrade_crackshot.Name: Mystic Shot
upgrade_crackshot.Description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

Passive.Description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

upgrade_magic_slow.Name: Mystic Slow
upgrade_magic_slow.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Movement Speed and Fire Rate reduced.

Passive.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Movement Speed and Fire Rate reduced.

upgrade_magic_vulnerability.Name: Mystic Vulnerability
upgrade_magic_vulnerability.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

Passive.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

upgrade_phantom_strike.Name: Phantom Strike
upgrade_phantom_strike.Description: Teleport to an enemy target, applying Disarm, Slow, and dealing damage.

Active.Description: Teleport to an enemy target, applying Disarm, Slow, and dealing damage.

upgrade_close_quarter_combat.Name: Point Blank
upgrade_close_quarter_combat.Description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

Passive.Description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

upgrade_pristine_emblem.Name: Pristine Emblem
upgrade_pristine_emblem.Description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.

Passive.Description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.

upgrade_quick_silver.Name: Quicksilver Reload
upgrade_quick_silver.Description:
Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.
Only activates when Ammo is not full.

Passive.Description:
Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.
Only activates when Ammo is not full.

upgrade_vex_barrier.Name: Reactive Barrier
upgrade_vex_barrier.Description: Automatically deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

Passive.Description: Automatically deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

upgrade_ability_refresher.Name: Refresher
upgrade_ability_refresher.Description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.

Active.Description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.

upgrade_rescue_beam.Name: Rescue Beam
upgrade_rescue_beam.Description: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

Active.Description: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

Passive.Description: When an enemy uses an ability within 50m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.

Active.Description: Consume all stacks to heal target ally and replenish a stamina point. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_medic_bullets.Name: Restorative Shot
upgrade_medic_bullets.Description: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

Passive.Description: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

upgrade_return_fire.Name: Return Fire
upgrade_return_fire.Description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

Active.Description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

upgrade_ricochet.Name: Ricochet
upgrade_ricochet.Description: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

Passive.Description: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

upgrade_cloaking_device_active.Name: Shadow Weave
upgrade_cloaking_device_active.Description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.

Active.Description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power.

upgrade_sharpshooter.Name: Sharpshooter
upgrade_sharpshooter.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

Passive.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

upgrade_targeted_silence.Name: Silence Glyph
upgrade_targeted_silence.Description: Fires a projectile which silences and damages the target. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

Active.Description: Fires a projectile which silences and damages the target. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.
For the next 4s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.

Passive.Description: Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal one stack of health if a siphoned target dies and lose 2 stacks if you die.
Your bullets apply Movement Slow.

upgrade_containment.Name: Slowing Hex
upgrade_containment.Description:
Deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

Active.Description:
Deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

Passive.Description: If you die, after 4s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.

upgrade_tech_defense_shredders.Name: Soul Shredder Bullets
upgrade_tech_defense_shredders.Description: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

Passive.Description: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

upgrade_tech_armor.Name: Spirit Armor
upgrade_tech_armor.Description: Reduces the damage you take from Spirit abilities.

upgrade_health_stealing_magic.Name: Spirit Lifesteal
upgrade_health_stealing_magic.Description: Your spirit items and abilities heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal. Heals for less on Non-Heroes and does not work on buildings.

upgrade_acolytes_glove.Name: Spirit Strike
upgrade_acolytes_glove.Description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

Passive.Description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

upgrade_tech_overflow.Name: Spiritual Overflow
upgrade_tech_overflow.Description: Gain bonus Spirit Power by charging up with your bullets on enemy heroes.

Passive.Description: Gain bonus Spirit Power by charging up with your bullets on enemy heroes.

upgrade_sprint_booster.Name: Sprint Boots
upgrade_sprint_booster.Description: Increases your forward movement speed over time. Taking damage resets the effect for 1.5s

upgrade_cooldown_reduction.Name: Superior Cooldown
upgrade_cooldown_reduction.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

Innate.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

upgrade_imbued_duration_extender.Name: Superior Duration
upgrade_imbued_duration_extender.Description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

Innate.Description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

Passive.Description: Increases the number of Air Dashes and Air Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2

upgrade_suppressor.Name: Suppressor
upgrade_suppressor.Description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

Passive.Description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

upgrade_magic_storm.Name: Surge of Power
upgrade_magic_storm.Description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Movement Speed.

Passive.Description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Movement Speed.

upgrade_chain_lightning.Name: Tesla Bullets
upgrade_chain_lightning.Description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

Passive.Description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

upgrade_tech_damage_pulse.Name: Torment Pulse
upgrade_tech_damage_pulse.Description: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

Passive.Description: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

upgrade_toxic_bullets.Name: Toxic Bullets
upgrade_toxic_bullets.Description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

Passive.Description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

upgrade_unstoppable.Name: Unstoppable
upgrade_unstoppable.Description:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

Active.Description:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.

upgrade_veil_walker.Name: Veil Walker
upgrade_veil_walker.Description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Movement Speed and restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields.

Passive.Description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Movement Speed and restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields.

upgrade_warp_stone.Name: Warp Stone
upgrade_warp_stone.Description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

Active.Description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

upgrade_withering_whip.Name: Withering Whip
upgrade_withering_whip.Description: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.

Active.Description: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.
